eg

Class CurrentProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.CurrentProject

  • public class CurrentProject
extends java.lang.Object
    The configuration and execution of actions of projects.

    A project is represented by an object of type ProjectActions and is configured and assigned to this current project when the FileDocument that is selected at the time is part of that project.
    Several projects can be configured and would be maintained. Any of these can be (re-)assigned to this current project if the selected FileDocument is part of it.

      Sets active the project from this List of configured projects which the currently selected FileDocument belongs to
      void openSettingsWindow()
      Opens the window of the SettingsWin object that belongs to a project.
      void retrieveProject()
      Tries to retrieve a project whose configuration is saved in the 'eadconfig' file in the project's directory or, if not existent, in the program's prefs file.
      void runProj()
      Runs this current project
      void saveAllAndCompile()
      Saves all open files of this current project and compiles the project
      void saveAndCompile()
      Saves the selected file and compiles the project

      Selects an element from this array of FileDocument by the specified index
      void updateFileTree()
      Updates the file tree if the selected FileDocument belongs to this current project

      • retrieveProject

        public void retrieveProject()
        Tries to retrieve a project whose configuration is saved in the 'eadconfig' file in the project's directory or, if not existent, in the program's prefs file.
        See Also:
        ProjectConfig.retrieveProject(String)

      • openSettingsWindow

        public void openSettingsWindow()
        Opens the window of the SettingsWin object that belongs to a project.

        Depending on the currently set FileDocument the opened window belongs to the currently active project, to one of this listed projects or to a project that can be newly assigned.
